name: Extreme Driver Grand City
description:
If you can’t destroy the mafia just lead it. Because you have friends, cars – and various reliable weapons in your hands for every possible accident that could happen.

Game features:
- New concept of graphics
- The free world with multiple possibilities
- Possibility to set up the game for different devices by setting up cars and pedestrians traffic
- Possibility to choose different cars for every tastes, staring from old-school cars to rare ones, jeeps, muscle cars, sport-cars and retro-cars like Tesla
- Race-riding missions
- Various different missions where you’ll meet the most dangerous groupings
- Multiple variety of dangerous weapons
- Intricate story
- Multiple characters you would remember

Gameplay:
Times change but not for better. There appear more and more danger in the city day by day. Citizens don’t need troubles and are trying to avoid these. Days flow brings fewer possibilities for that while evil arises.

New groupings are trying to break you down and to appropriate you capabilities. You can resist it back. The world can be balanced. You have to become the new point of balance.
